title: Love the Trio Packs
content: Tampax has been my go to tampon brand for over 25 years. I absolutely love the trio packs so I don't have to store 3 boxes under my sink. With leakguard protection, I never have to worry about embarrassing moments occurring when I'm participating in activities where there isn't a bathroom near by. I also appreciate that these are free of dyes, perfume, latex, BPA, and elemental chlorine bleaching.
